project_descr: Development Planning, Coordination, Monitoring and Evaluation, and Aid Efectiveness

outputs.output_descr: The project aims at strengthening the Government planning and monitoring systems, the aid coordination capacity, the implementation of participatory development planning and monitoring platforms and production of human development reports.
The support  to IND aims at building the capacity of the institution to implenet the NMAP to comply with the Otawa convention

This objective will be achieved through; 1) supporting activities that will lead to the exploitation of the potential of Information and Communication Technologies (ICTs) in general, 2) supporting the expansion of access to information and communication by public institutions, citizens and communities. All these actions will have a special emphasis on access to the Internet at central, provincial and district levels.
 
This expansion in access will lead to the growth of Electronic Government and in particular, citizens and the private sector will benefit from increased access to public services, as well as in facilitating their participation in the governance of the country through e-Participation, e-Democracy, and e-Administration. The government's electronic network (GovNet), government portals at central and provincial levels, the Provincial Digital Resource Centres (CPRDs) and the Multi-media Community Centres are important support through which these actions will be implemented. 

Some activities that were initially planned for 2009 but were however not carried out due to budgetary restrictions, have been reformulated and figure again among the activities for 2010. Some of the outstanding activities include the use of ICTs to strengthen the availability of information about Mozambique, a survey on the state of ICTs in the public sector, implementation of the Electronic Government strategy and training for state employees in the ICT area.

The UTICT will make an effort during 2010 to ensure financial sustainability as well as that of the CPRDs and CMCs by 1) guaranteeing close links between these bodies and 2) ensuring that allocation of the project's financial resources are directed more towards project activities rather than to other purposes.  

The support to UTICT project intends to attain its main goal through the following outcomes:
1.1.6	Support given for making the Electronic Government Strategy operational.
2.1.6	Management of Information Communication Technologies in selected provinces, districts and municipalities strengthened and responsibilities of the partners in implementing the GovNet strategy redefined.

project_title: development planning, coordination and m & e
